title: The Forgiveness Protocol
story_summary: News of the hidden forgiveness command spreads fast. The city argues, then votes. Old scores vanish overnight. Freed people pour into the streets. Some embrace former outcasts. Others refuse to forget. Stenograd faces chaos and hope as everyone tries to decide what trust means now.

official.headline: Assembly Momentum
official.anchor_line: Public assemblies across Stenograd welcome dialogue about unity and transparency.
official.contextual_reframing: Civic participation in public discussions demonstrates community resilience and renewed trust in systemic oversight.

official.headline: Referendum Decision
official.anchor_line: Citizens voted calmly in a citywide paper ballot referendum to determine Stenograd's future.
official.contextual_reframing: Orderly voting reflects Stenograd's capacity for collective, data-informed choice in moments of uncertainty.

official.headline: Protocol Activated
official.anchor_line: The BCI forgiveness protocol is officially triggered, resetting behavioral histories for all residents.
official.contextual_reframing: This decisive action unlocks social reconciliation, ensuring every citizen can move forward together in a revitalized Stenograd.

underground.headline: Whispers Break Out
underground.anchor_line: The forgiveness protocol leak proves secrets the system wanted buried won't stay hidden forever.
underground.contextual_reframing: As trusted voices rally and evidence spreads, the city's quiet obedience slips. Even Council interference can't erase what people now know.

underground.headline: Chaos In The Streets
underground.anchor_line: Protests and mass arguments flood Stenograd as citizens demand a real choice.
underground.contextual_reframing: Crowds won't wait for permission. For once, voices usually left out lead from below. Trust can't just be reset by propaganda or numbers.

underground.headline: Scores Wiped Clean
underground.anchor_line: After days of bitter debate, the city activates Halden's buried amnesty  -  every BCI score erased, flagged people freed.
underground.contextual_reframing: Old scars and anger don't disappear overnight. The slate's clean, but Stenograd's trust must be rebuilt from scratch, in the open, for the first time.
